name: Kinship
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Data from DeBruine (2002) Facial Resemblance Enhances Trust, PRSLB. https://osf.io/ewfhs/

variableMeasured.name: trust_self
variableMeasured.description: Number of trusting moves towards self-morphs

variableMeasured.name: trust_other
variableMeasured.description: Number of trusting moves towards self-morphs

variableMeasured.name: recip_self
variableMeasured.description: Number of reciprocating moves towards other-morphs

variableMeasured.name: recip_other
variableMeasured.description: Number of reciprocating moves towards other-morphs
